content.title: Action for Success
content.body:
1. From the top-right of the Action Editor window, select the Design View.
  2. From the Action Editor canvas, select IF Recipients.opstatus is equal to 0.
  3. From the Action Editor left menu, under the Widget section, select Set Widget Property.
  4. From the right pane, expand Desktop Forms > frmAddRecipient > flxAddRecipient and select flexSuccess.
  5. In the last pane modify the following values:
    • Property: Visible
    • Value: True
